scripts.docs: copyfiles index.html docs && copyfiles package.json docs && copyfiles style.css docs && copyfiles js/** docs && copyfiles claim-abi.json docs && copyfiles static/** docs
scripts.postinstall: copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/koilib/dist/koinos.min.js js && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/koilib/dist/koinos.js js && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/kondor-js/dist/kondor.min.js js && copyfiles -u 3 node_modules/kondor-js/dist/kondor.js js && copyfiles -u 4 node_modules/@roamin/my-koinos-wallet-sdk/dist/my-koinos-wallet-sdk.module.js js
